talk1007:
<snd:Painful_00>I can...<sp:5:0:0> I can take it. This little taste of
sludge is nothing to me...<sp:5:0:0> Aaargh! <sp:5:0:0>Ugh...
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>Link! I heard the news!


They say you investigated the islands in
the sky with our own King Sidon!

<sp:3:0:2:0100>You're amazing!


<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad_01>I'm so embarrassed that I was fast asleep
because of the sludge...<sp:5:0:0> And while I slept,
you two were doing so much for us!
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Think_00>That <clr:0000>glowing green stone<clr:ffff> really is ideal for
strength training.

The weight of it, <sp:5:0:0>and the shape as well.<sp:5:0:0>
It's perfect...
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Oh, yes! <sp:5:0:0>When I behold that stone, I feel
immediately motivated to follow through
with my tough strength training!
If you're curious, why not go and see it
for yourself?

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>It can be found <clr:0000>southwest <clr:ffff>of the domain,
in the <clr:0000>underground cave of Ralis Pond<clr:ffff>.
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>My body feels great these days.<sp:5:0:0> It must
be the result of my strength training!

<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Though I'm a little disappointed that the
glowing green stone that was in the cave
is gone now...
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>I'm so embarrassed that I fell asleep
because of the sludge.

Now I must wash away the sludge that
clings to my reputation! That is why I am
rebuilding myself little by little.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>At the <clr:0000>underground cave of Ralis Pond<clr:ffff>,
there is a <clr:0000>glowing green stone <clr:ffff>that is
ideal for strength training. How fortunate!
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_01>Good morning, Link!


As always, I am going to give today my
very best!
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Greeting_01>Greetings, Link! Do you feel it? Ahhh,
this is the perfect weather for strength
training!
talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Scare_00>Seggin...<sp:5:0:0> Please do not worry about
me... <sp:5:0:0>You must look after the others...<sp:5:0:0>
Guh...<sp:5:0:0> Urgh!<sp:5:1:0>
talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive_00>I made up my mind that I can't just leave
things as they are.<sp:5:0:0> I'm going into that
<clr:0000>cave<clr:ffff> to rebuild myself stronger than ever!
<sp:3:0:2:0101>There is a <clr:0000>stone that glows green <clr:ffff>there.<sp:5:0:0>
Upon first sight, I was enraptured by it!
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>I'll keep on training until I become a
great warrior just like you, Link!
talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Happy>Indeed.<sp:5:0:0> Its shape and weight make it
ideal for strength training.

If you're interested, why not go and see
for yourself?

<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>You'll find the glowing green stone
<clr:0000>southwest <clr:ffff>of the domain, at the
<clr:0000>underground cave of Ralis Pond<clr:ffff>.
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Oh... <sp:5:0:0>Um... <sp:5:0:0>Yes, of course!<sp:5:0:0> If you are also
interested in that stone, feel free to ask
me about it!
talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Unconscious>The sludge <sp:5:0:0>has gotten in my gills...
<sp:5:0:0>Urgh...<sp:5:0:0> Urp!
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseM_01>Whoa!<sp:5:1:0> Ahem. <sp:5:0:0>G-good evening, Link!


I suppose I overdid it with my training and
dozed off...<sp:5:0:0> How embarrassing.
